tool module¶

class tool.Tool(toolname, tooltype, axis)[source]¶

Bases: object

Tool class which could be a 1 channel pipette, 8ch pipette, grabber, etc

A Tool is a base class intended to be subclassed into specific tool types that are attached to the physical moveable head of the robot. Example subclassed tools could be: -single channel pipette -8 channel pipette -plate grabber -camera

set_offset(offset)[source]¶

Set/reset x,y,z offset of a tool relative to A from a calibration procedure

location = a tuple containing the offset in mm
of the tool relative to the A tool
